meanings.sent1: The preconcerted meeting went smoothly as everything was planned ahead of time.
meanings.sent2: The team had a preconcerted strategy for the game, which helped them win.
meanings.sent3: It was a preconcerted decision to have a surprise party for her, but she found out anyway.
meanings.sent4: The preconcerted sequence of events unfolded like a carefully choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The preconcerted schedule ensured that everything was organized and on time.

meanings.sent1: The preconcerted agreement between the two parties was finally revealed.
meanings.sent2: The preconcerted outcome of the experiment was exactly as predicted.
meanings.sent3: The preconcerted plan to prank him backfired when he found out beforehand.
meanings.sent4: Their preconcerted decision to travel together led to many unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The preconcerted result of their collaboration was a masterpiece beyond expectations.
